response.original_title: Bear In The Big Blue House: A Bear For All Seasons
response.overview: Join Bear, Tutter, Pip & Pop, Ojo, and Treelo for three all-weather adventures that teach your child about the four seasons, encourage individuality, and promote friendship and caring. Let the sunshine in with "Summer Cooler," complete with a game of checkers, a dip in the Otter Pond, and more. Then feel yourself "Falling For Fall," with pumpkins and colorful autumn leaves, before joining Bear(TM) and the gang for some rainy day fun in "All-Weather Bear." Whatever the season, whatever the reason, there's always something surprising to see and do in the Big Blue House!
response.title: Bear In The Big Blue House: A Bear For All Seasons
